resources.string: In the second tutorial you learn how to fight enemies with your magic bolt.
This is the second tutorial. Here you will learn how to fight your enemies.
On the right side is a knight who wants to stop you. Click and hold [colour='FFFFFFFF'][image='input_buttons/attack'][colour='FF000000'] to release a magic bolt. You will need two hits to kill him.
Congratulations you learned how to use your bolt
Now reach the flag to finish this tutorial
